summary: Meeting of the garage cooperative must exclude four own members because of a new highway's building. After the meeting it becomes clear that the exit door is closed by one of the members, who requires an equitable solution.
cast: Liya Akhedzhakova|Iya Savvina|Svetlana Nemolyaeva|Valentin Gaft|Georgiy Burkov|Vyacheslav Nevinnyy|Andrey Myagkov|Leonid Markov|Igor Kostolevskiy|Olga Ostroumova|Anastasiya Voznesenskaya|Gleb Strizhenov|Borislav Brondukov|Semyon Farada|Natalya Gurzo|Alla Budnitskaya|Zoya Isaeva|Mikhail Kokshenov|Aleksandr Lebedev|Vladimir Myshkin|Dmitriy Orlovskiy|Aleksandr Pyatkov|Tatyana Rogozina|Eldar Ryazanov|Natalia Sanko|Pyotr Shcherbakov|L. Tsvetkova|Mariya Vinogradova|V. Voinorovsky|Vadim Zakharchenko
title: Garazh
